Package org.sontana.tools

Class Toolbox

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sontana.tools.Toolbox
  • public class Toolbox
extends java.lang.Object
    The Toolbox class contains various methods that perform common functions.
    Author:
    Christophe Simon

      • clamp

        public static int clamp​(int value,
                        int min,
                        int max)
        Clamps a value between two numbers.
        Parameters:
        value - the clamped value.
        min - the minimum possible value.
        max - the maximum possible value.
        Returns:
        the clamped value between min and max.

      • clamp

        public static int clamp​(int value,
                        int min,
                        int max,
                        boolean loop)
        Clamps a value between two numbers.
        Parameters:
        value - the clamped value.
        min - the minimum possible value.
        max - the maximum possible value.
        loop - if values under min or over max should wrap back around.
        Returns:
        the clamped value between min and max.

      • clamp

        Clamps a value between two numbers.

        min - the minimum possible value.

      • clamp

        public static float clamp​(float value,
                          float min,
                          float max,
                          boolean loop)
        Clamps a value between two numbers.
        Parameters:
        value - the clamped value.
        min - the minimum possible value.
        max - the maximum possible value.
        loop - if values under min or over max should wrap back around.
        Returns:
        the clamped value between min and max.

      • lerp

        public static float lerp​(float start,
                         float end,
                         float ratio)
        Linearly interpolates between start and end by ratio.
        Parameters:
        start - the starting point at interpolate ratio 0.
        end - the ending point at interpolate ratio 1.
        ratio - the interpolate ratio between 0 and 1.
        Returns:
        a value between start and end.

      • lerpUnclamped

        public static float lerpUnclamped​(float start,
                                  float end,
                                  float ratio)
        Linearly interpolates between start and end by an unbounded ratio.
        Parameters:
        start - the starting point at interpolate ratio 0.
        end - the ending point at interpolate ratio 1.
        ratio - the interpolate ratio.
        Returns:
        a value relative to the distance between start and end.
